title: Graduated at Re:Coded
content: I was working on a team of 4 developers and a trainer. We managed to create an application for people who wants to buy/sell books, it is called Libvery. We received the certification after 3 months of intense learning.
brief: Graduated the Reactjs Web Development Bootcamp at Re:Coded ðŸŽ‰

title: Joined Re:Coded
content: Re:Coded React Bootcamp was a game changer for me. I applied for this bootcamp not only for coding but mostly for networking and knowing how to communicate efficiently. When I applied there was more than 400 applicants which made it really competitive to get accepted. You must have run into 4 different phases about filling application, coding, mindset and interviewing. Before joing the bootcamp I had no idea about how to communicate properly with people around me, especially when it comes to programming. Now I feel that I'm getting better and feel more comfortable working in a team. Honestly, it was an intense 3 months of bootcamp which included many assignments but we also had funny activities and social committe which made the environment much more nicer. I'm really glad that I found Re:Coded and got to know such amazing people with diffrient ideas.
brief: Participated in Reactjs Bootcamp at Re:Coded.

title: Software Engineering Department
content: I got into my dream department which is Software Engineering or CS related departments at college. I got into Koya University which is one of the most beautiful college in Kurdistan. I'm currently a sophomore student.

title: Started to learn programming
content: I really wanted to code and learn programming. At first, I was at Medical Laboratory College but I didn't like it. Honestly it was one of the hardest decision that I made because I spent a whole year in Medical Laboratory College and I needed to switch to SE department. Everyone tried to convince me to stay at MLT department but I always had that passion for SE department and learn to code. So I started to switch to SE department and learn programming in June, 2020 with so much passion and excitement even though I had no prior experience. First I tried to learn PHP without knowning why and what I can do with it. I spend a few weeks to months but then I switched to HTML, CSS and JavaScript. This was when my journey started and began to fall in love with programming. Now I know some technologies such as JavaScript, Reactjs, Nextjs and Firebase. I'm really glad that I chose this field and always looking forward to learn more.
